data.comment: The match has started.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In the minute 2, Hacken have a dangerous throw-in.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Hacken close to the penalty box.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a Varbergs throw-in in Hacken's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 9, Hacken are pushing forward but Ahmed Yasin's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Varbergs goal kick.
Hacken's Alexander Soderlund scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 10, Great play from Leonard Zuta to set up the goal.
In Gothenburg Hacken drive forward through Leo Bengtsson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 14, Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
In Gothenburg, Leonard Zuta (Hacken) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Varbergs at Bravida Arena.
Throw-in Varbergs.
Free kick for Hacken in the half of Varbergs.
In the minute 17, At Bravida Arena, Hacken are penalized for being offside.
Can Varbergs get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hacken's half?
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Varbergs in the half of Hacken.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Varbergs have a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
Free kick Varbergs.
In the minute 26, Varbergs's Gustaf Norlin misses with an attempt on goal.
Kaspar Sjoberg awards Hacken a goal kick.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in high up the field for Hacken in Gothenburg.
Varbergs to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
In the minute 29, Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Varbergs.
Hacken to take a throw-in in Varbergs territory.
Free kick for Varbergs in their own half.
In the minute 30, In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Gothenburg, Leonard Zuta of Hacken is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Varbergs in their own half.
In the minute 32, Hacken's Gustav Berggren gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Varbergs goal kick.
Kaspar Sjoberg awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Varbergs needs to be cautious. Hacken have an attacking throw-in.
Astrit Seljmani gets his shot on target but fails to score for Varbergs.
Varbergs are caught offside.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Varbergs in their own half.
Free kick Hacken.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Varbergs at Bravida Arena.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a throw-in for Varbergs, close to Hacken's area.
Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Hacken drives forward and Ahmed Yasin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Hacken capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Varbergs's half?
Kaspar Sjoberg awards Hacken a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Varbergs advance rapidly upfield but Kaspar Sjoberg blows for offside.
In Gothenburg Hacken attack through Leo Bengtsson. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Bravida Arena.
The second-half has started.
Hacken needs to be cautious. Varbergs have an attacking throw-in.
Joakim Persson is making the team's first substitution at Bravida Arena with Tashreeq Matthews replacing Erion Sadiku.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Albert Ejupi with Adama Fofana. This is the second substitution made today by Joakim Persson.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 47, Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a Varbergs throw-in in Hacken's half.
In the minute 49, Hacken have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hacken in their own half.
Junes Barny (Varbergs) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 50, Kaspar Sjoberg awards the home team a throw-in.
Varbergs awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Varbergs close to the penalty box.
In the minute 52, Hacken's Ahmed Yasin gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Varbergs defender.
Gideon Mensah (Varbergs) has received a yellow card from Kaspar Sjoberg.
Important block from the Varbergs defence as Leonard Zuta fires in a strike for Hacken.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Varbergs in their own half.
Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
At Bravida Arena, Ahmed Yasin has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 55, Varbergs have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Hacken in the half of Varbergs.
Can Varbergs capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hacken's half?
In the minute 57, Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Varbergs's half?
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Hacken.
Ball safe as Varbergs is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 59, Hacken's Leo Bengtsson breaks free at Bravida Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Kaspar Sjoberg awards Varbergs a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Hacken.
Throw-in for Varbergs at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 63, Goal! Hacken extend their lead to 2-0 through Leo Bengtsson.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In the minute 68, Free kick Hacken.
Throw-in high up the field for Hacken in Gothenburg.
Robin Tranberg is replacing Albin Winbo for the away team.
In the minute 69, The away team replace Junes Barny with Alibek Aliev.
Throw-in for Varbergs in the half of Hacken.
Joakim Persson (Varbergs) is making a fifth substitution, with Samuel Monday replacing Luke Le Roux.
In the minute 72, Astrit Seljmani for Varbergs drives towards goal at Bravida Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Hacken drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a throw-in for Hacken, close to Varbergs's area.
In the minute 75, Varbergs awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Gothenburg to check on Leo Bengtsson, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 78, Leo Bengtsson returns to the field for Hacken after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick for Varbergs in their own half.
It seems as if Leo Bengtsson is unable to continue. Alexander Faltsetas replaces him for the home team.
Varbergs have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 79, Viktor Lundberg is replacing Alexander Soderlund for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Can Varbergs get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hacken's half?
In the minute 81, Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hacken have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Varbergs.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Hacken.
In the minute 84, Andreas Alm (Hacken) is making a third substitution, with Jasse Tuominen replacing Ahmed Yasin.
Tobias Carlsson is replacing Daleho Irandust for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Kaspar Sjoberg.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Varbergs.
Goal kick for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Varbergs's Astrit Seljmani gets in a shot on goal at Bravida Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Samuel Monday for Varbergs has been booked by Kaspar Sjoberg and receives a first yellow card.
Kaspar Sjoberg signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Varbergs in the half of Hacken.
Ball goes out of play for a Hacken goal kick.
Can Varbergs capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Hacken's Godswill Ekpolo has been booked in Gothenburg.
Goal! Robin Tranberg pulls one back to make it 2-1.
